Search











 







Commute












Commute





 



Commute Toolkit

Thinking about resuming your commute to campus? We have resources to help you prepare.






 



Free and Discounted Transportation

Take advantage of the many incentives Stanford offers  to encourage commuters to use sustainable transportation, including free and discounted transit. 







One-on-One Commute Consultations


For university commuters, our team is available for one-on-one commute consultations via Zoom to help you assess your options and answer your questions. 





Find Your Sustainable Commute Options


Learn about Stanford Transportation's resources, including commute planning assistance, sample commute plans, free and discounted transit, and more. 





Request Commute Planning Assistance


Want to try alternative transportation but are not sure how to begin? Request a custom commute plan. 





Try our Do-It-Yourself Commute Planning Tool


Find your transit and/or bike options with help from our do-it-yourself commute planning tool. 





Commute Cost & Carbon Emissions Calculator


Use this calculator to quantify the financial and environmental costs (or savings) of your commute.
